channel.title: Autoupgrade on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Autoupgrade on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Update Assistant module v7.0.0 is available (Autoupgrade)
item.description: We are pleased to introduce the latest major release of the Update Assistant module (formerly known as 1-Click Upgrade).

item.title: Adapting to PrestaShop 9: Guzzle is gone, what's next?
item.description: PrestaShop 9 is a major release, meaning it introduces breaking changes, including the removal of certain dependencies. One of the most impactful changes for module developers is the removal of Guzzle, a popular HTTP client that many modules relied on.

item.title: Reworking the "Update Assistant" Module V7: Our Experience
item.description: Let’s face it—our Update Assistant module was messy. The front-end was confusing, the user experience was challenging, and even minor adjustments were a little more complex than what we would have liked.

item.title: Autoupgrade module v6.1.0 and 6.2.0 are Available (1-Click Upgrade)
item.description: In the footsteps of the latest module releases (see version 6.0.0 release blogpost), these versions bring a number of improvements to streamline PrestaShop updates. Explore the changelog below to find out what version 6.1.0 and 6.2.0 bring to the upgrade module.

item.title: Autoupgrade module v6.0.0 is Available (1-Click Upgrade)
item.description: In the footsteps of the latest module releases (see versions 5.0.2 and 5.0.3 live presentation), this version brings a number of improvements to streamline PrestaShop updates. Explore the changelog below to find out what version 6.0.0 brings to the Autoupgrade module.

item.title: Test the updated 1-Click Upgrade module!
item.description: After much work and hair-pulling, we finally did it: the 1-Click Upgrade module supports upgrading from 1.6 to 1.7.1.0. Are you ready to test it before the release?
